name: MLObjectDetector.AnnotationType
desc: The available types of image annotations.

items.name: case boundingBox(units: MLBoundingBoxUnits, origin: MLBoundingBoxCoordinatesOrigin, anchor: MLBoundingBoxAnchor)
items.desc: An annotation type that defines a rectangle around an object within an image.

items.name: enum MLBoundingBoxUnits
items.desc: The units a bounding box annotation uses to define its position and size.

items.name: enum MLBoundingBoxAnchor
items.desc: A location within a bounding box that an annotation’s coordinates use as their reference point.

items.name: enum MLBoundingBoxCoordinatesOrigin
items.desc: The location within an image that an annotation’s coordinates use as their origin.
